data.patch_unified:
--- utils.py
+++ utils.py
@@ -1,5 +1,6 @@
import ast
 
 def process_input(user_input):
-    return eval(user_input)
+    # Sanitize input to prevent arbitrary code execution
+    return ast.literal_eval(user_input)
data.rationale: Replaces unsafe eval() with ast.literal_eval() to safely evaluate literal inputs only, eliminating arbitrary code execution risks while minimally altering functionality. Docstrings remain unchanged, satisfying 'docstring_ok'.
data.notes: Assumes utils.py contains a function using eval on user input; patch is reversible and preserves behavior for valid literals.
